Issue.creator: corecode
Issue.summary: start new view timer only after receiving a quorum of view change messages
Issue.description: Right now we start the new view timer as soon as we send our own view change message. Per PBFT, we should only start the new view timer once we have received a quorum of view change messages. Related to that, we probably should resend our most recent view change message on Connection, if we are still in view change.
